about_the_game:
Introduction


“Memories of Rachel” is a text adventure game in which you pick up keywords called ‘fragments’ from your memories,
The main character is Kaori Kashima, a high school sophomore.

The main character is Kaori Kashima, a second-year high school student.
While she is returning home with her best friend Rachel, Rachel is stabbed to death by a black hooded figure who suddenly appears.

Unintentionally, Kaori Kashima gets hold of a time machine and goes back to her original time.
Although she has indeed been able to go back in time, she finds herself in a slightly different world - a parallel world.
Simply going back in time would not have brought her to the parallel world.

Rachel is alive and moving before her eyes.
However, there was a reason why Kaori had to go back to the original world line.

Where was the point of divergence from the original world, which branched off into a parallel world?
She tries to find it in her memories and attempts to travel back in time at the correct junction, but...

Character




Kashima Kaori

Second year high school student. She is an introverted girl who has no passion for drawing.
The day before summer vacation, her best friend Rachel is brutally murdered in front of her eyes,
At the same time, she obtains a time machine.
She tries to pretend that Rachel's murder never happened, but she finds herself in a slightly different world.



Rachel Everett MacPherson

Second year high school student. She was born and raised in Yokohama, but has Scottish parents.
She is cheerful and speaks clearly. She talks and laughs a lot.
She actively makes friends, tries to fit in, and tries not to make enemies.



Hayami Yukari

A first-year high school student. A childhood friend of Kaori.
She is a girl with a stoic attitude toward drawing and maintains her isolation.




Ogasawara Natsuki

Art teacher at the high school where Kaori and Rachel attend. She is also the advisor of the art club.
She recruits Kaori and Rachel to the art club whenever she sees them.
Her hobby is driving cars.



Daisy R Copenhagen


A girl from the future who came from 80 years later. She is honest and straightforward. She talks straight.
She risked time travel to come to the present day for a certain purpose.
She is often concerned about time performance.




Ruka

Daisy's black cat-shaped autonomous OI (Organoid Intelligence).
It is a friend and a constant companion.




Abigail Everett MacPherson


Rachel's younger sister. She is in the second grade of elementary school.
Like her sister, she was born and raised in Yokohama with Scottish parents.
She is known for her problematic behavior, such as making her elementary school classmates cry, breaking things on purpose, and being arrested for shoplifting.

content_descriptors.notes:
This work contains depictions of violence.
Sexual acts are not depicted, but may be suggested in scenarios.

Sexualisierte Gewalt / Sexual violence
Drastische Gewalt

short_description: Kaori Kashima has come to a parallel world that is slightly different from reality. Based on the things that come up in her memories from conversations, This is a parallel world yuri sci-fi text adventure game that explores when the world branched off from reality.
